title: Lightning
description: What happens when the one you trust becomes the one you shouldn’t? PaxtonMy boss was killed by his wife. I know this to be true but can’t prove it. Now someone is coming after his tantalizing daughter, Alicia. I couldn’t protect her father. To honor his memory, I will use every ounce of my training and expertise as a Navy SEAL to keep Alicia safe... even if it costs my life. AliciaMy father’s death was ruled an accident. I know it wasn’t. When I could finally bring myself to go through his things, I stumbled onto a secret as shocking as it is dangerous. Someone doesn’t want the truth exposed and will kill to keep it buried. Paxton works for the security team my father owned and vows to protect me. Now, he’s the only one I can trust as danger closes in.
author: Danielle Pays
